name: google-closure-compiler-linux
description: Check, compile, optimize and compress Javascript with Closure-Compiler using Java
author: Chad Killingsworth <chadkillingsworth@gmail.com>

scripts.build: ./check-build-image.js; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "google-closure-compiler-linux building image"; node ../../build-scripts/graal.js; else echo "google-closure-compiler-linux build"; fi
